aboutpara:
I'm Swaroop Sambhayya, Design-Developer ( people say as Unicorn developer ) focused on solving the user's problem through Design and bringing the Design to life through Product.
I have around 4+ years of experience in developing mobile and web apps using various frameworks like Flutter, React Native and React. I'm also a UI/UX engineer having experience in designing UI/UX with Figma and Xd.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with Flutter, React Native, React, Javascript, and most of the Front-end frameworks.

experiences.bullets: As a Senior Engineer I was responsible for developing and guiding application development, I involved in different projects having wide range of tech stacks including backend servers
As a developer I was responsible for developing buttery smooth pixel perfect UI in various front end frameworks

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
